org.mime4j
Class CloseShieldInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      org.mime4j.CloseShieldInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class CloseShieldInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream

InputStream that shields its underlying input stream from being closed.

Version:
$Id: CloseShieldInputStream.java,v 1.2 2004/10/02 12:41:10 ntherning Exp $

Joe Cheng
